slides.title: ZANZIBAR
slides.subtitle: Respira Zanzibar
slides.description: Discover pristine beaches, turquoise waters, and the calm tropical soul of Zanzibar. A perfect escape to breathe, relax, and explore.

slides.title: INDIAN OCEAN
slides.subtitle: Pure Blue
slides.description: Crystal-clear waters and endless horizons make Zanzibar one of the most spectacular island destinations in the world.

slides.title: STONE TOWN
slides.subtitle: Culture & History
slides.description: Stone Town is a living museum of Swahili culture, rich in history, traditions, and timeless architecture.

destinations.title: Nakupenda Sandbank
destinations.description: A breathtaking white sandbank in the middle of the ocean, perfect for swimming, snorkeling, and relaxation.

destinations.title: Prison Island
destinations.description: Famous for its giant tortoises and historic prison ruins surrounded by turquoise waters.

destinations.title: Pungume Island Tour
destinations.description: A nature-filled boat tour through mangroves, dolphin spotting, snorkeling, and fresh seafood lunch.

featured.title: Featured Tours & Packages
featured.description: Our most loved tours and special offers designed to give you the best Zanzibar experience.

experiences.title: Experiences & Activities
experiences.subtitle: Choose how you want to experience Zanzibar — adventure, culture, nature, or relaxation.
experiences.safari_desc: Wildlife adventures, marine safaris, snorkeling, and nature exploration across Zanzibar.
experiences.beach_desc: White sandy beaches, turquoise waters, sunbathing, swimming, and breathtaking sunsets.
experiences.culture_desc: Discover Swahili traditions, historic Stone Town, spice farms, and local communities.
experiences.adventure_desc: Quad biking, cave swimming, horseback riding, and thrilling outdoor activities.
experiences.food_desc: Taste Zanzibar’s flavors through seafood, spices, street food, and village life.
